resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203305</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Impact of the Seasons on Earth Systems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswirkung der Jahreszeiten auf Masse Systeme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Impact des saisons sur des systèmes de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Impacto das estações em sistemas da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetto delle stagioni sui sistemi della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίκτυπος των εποχών στα γήινα συστήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Impacto de las estaciones en sistemas de la 
tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site features Flash animations that illustrate how seasons impact various Earth systems, including surface temperature, latent heat flux, air temperature, net radiation, precipitation, runoff, and soil moisture. These resources are suitable for use in lectures, labs, or other teaching activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Situationsmerkmale blinken Animationen, die
veranschaulichen, wie Jahreszeiten verschiedene Masse Systeme, 
einschließlich Oberflächentemperatur, latenten Hitzefluß, 
Lufttemperatur, Nettostrahlung, Niederschlag, Abfluß und 
Bodenfeuchtigkeit auswirken. Diese Betriebsmittel sind für 
Gebrauch in den Vorträgen, in den Labors oder in anderen 
unterrichtenden Aktivitäten verwendbar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les dispositifs de ce site flashent les animations
qui illustrent comment les saisons effectuent de divers systèmes de 
la terre, y compris la température de surface, flux latent de la 
chaleur, température de l'air, rayonnement net, précipitation, 
écoulement, et humidité de sol. Ces ressources conviennent 
pour l'usage dans les conférences, les laboratoires, ou d'autres 
activités d'enseignement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As características deste local piscam os 
animations que ilustram como as estações impactam vários sistemas 
da terra, including a temperatura de superfície, o fluxo latente do 
calor, a temperatura de ar, a radiação líquida, a precipitação, o
runoff, e a umidade do solo. Estes recursos são apropriados 
para o uso nos lectures, nos laboratórios, ou em outras atividades 
ensinando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche di questo luogo espongono a flash 
animazioni che illustrano come le stagioni hanno effetto sui vari 
sistemi della terra, compreso la temperatura in superficie, sul 
cambiamento continuo latente di calore, sulla temperatura dell'aria, 
sulla radiazione netta, sulla precipitazione, sullo scolo e 
sull'umidità del terreno. Queste risorse sono adatte ad uso 
nelle conferenze, in laboratori, o in altre attività d'istruzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή χαρακτηρίζει τις ζωτικότητες λάμψης 
που επεξηγούν πώς οι εποχές επηρεάζουν τα διάφορα γήινα 
συστήματα, συμπεριλαμβανομένης της θερμοκρασίας επιφάνειας, τη 
λανθάνουσα ροή θερμότητας, τη θερμοκρασία αέρα, την καθαρή 
ακτινοβολία, την πτώση, την απορροή, και την εδαφολογική υγρασία.
Αυτά τα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς είναι κατάλληλα για τη χρήση
στις διαλέξεις, τα εργαστήρια, ή άλλες δραστηριότητες 
διδασκαλίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las características de este sitio contellean las 
animaciones que ilustran cómo las estaciones afectan varios sistemas 
de la tierra, incluyendo la temperatura superficial, flux latente del 
calor, temperatura del aire, la radiación neta, la precipitación, la
salida, y la humedad del suelo. Estos recursos son convenientes 
para el uso en conferencias, laboratorios, u otras actividades de 
enseñanza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203305</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons

ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104426</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/impact-of-the-seasons-on-earth-systems</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
